item.description: A writing system supports Two-Way-RSS if it not only publishes RSS (as they all do), but also accepts RSS as input, so I can write using my favorite writing tools, and publish through your CMS. This is the key to a new writer's web with no lock-in, no silos.
item.source:markdown: A writing system supports _Two-Way-RSS_ if it not only publishes RSS (as they all do), but also accepts RSS as input, so I can write using my favorite writing tools, and publish through your CMS. This is the key to a new writer's web with no lock-in, no silos.

item.description: I'd like to see every NBA player sign a statement saying they don't practice race-hate, or they don't get to play professional basketball in the US. They get to keep their free speech, and fans get to know we aren't subsidizing the downfall of civilization.
item.source:markdown: I'd like to see every NBA player sign a statement saying they don't practice race-hate, or they don't get to play professional basketball in the US. They get to keep their free speech, and fans get to know we aren't subsidizing the downfall of civilization.
